question: The earnings of India from diamond export is quite high. Which one of the following factors has contributed to it?
option1: Pre-independence stock-piling of diamonds in the country which are now exported
option2: Large production of industrial diamonds in the country
option3: Expertise available for cutting and polishing of imported diamonds which are then exported
option4: As in the past, India produces huge quantity of gem diamonds which are exported
answer: Expertise available for cutting and polishing of imported diamonds which are then exported
explanation: The earnings of India from diamond export is quite high. This is because the expertise is available for cutting and polishing of imported diamonds which are then exported.
